Reviews.Title: Great system, great price.
Reviews.Author: Govert Koetsier
Reviews.Content: Great system for a great price. Exactly what we needed. We use the system to be able to see our chickens when we are not home. picture quality is great. The remote viewing of the cameras using IE works really well. Using the iphone/ipad apps works not so good. The DVR uses activex, which is not supported by any browser/system other than IE/microsoft.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: E3
Reviews.Content: Absolutely worth every penny. Works exactly as described. Replaced my IP cameras with this system, much better for my needs. REAL TIME!! :) Thanks Zmodo.

Reviews.Title: Good starter package
Reviews.Author: Albert Lee Martinez
Reviews.Content: Good little system to get you stated. Had major difficulty setting it up to view from smartphones/tablets and just when I was about to give up, I got it working. Camera quality is OK but definitely not detailed. Fine for short distance but for those long camera views when you also need quality I suggest upgrading that specific camera  to a higher resolution camera. It does have a via port but wish it had an hdmi port.

ProductInfo.Features:
Check Video Footage Anywhere Anytime via PC or Smartphone-This system allows you to view your footage, no matter the time or location. Access your DVR's footage over the internet, or directly from your AndroidTM, iPhone®, iPad®, SymbianTM, Windows Mobile®, or BlackBerry®.
Advanced Motion Detection Recording-The motion detection options allow you to record only when motion is detected to save hard drive space without missing important events.
Scheduled Recording Options-Choose the specific days of the week and hours of the day you would like your DVR to record or not record.
Easy USB Backup-A Built-in USB port gives you the option of backing up and transferring your video footage with a USB flash drive.
Instant Email Alerts if Activity Detected-This system is designed to send an email alert, complete with photo of the activity, if any motion is detected, or if any camera experiences video loss.
